verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that prophesy <S%H5012><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> thou unto them that prophesy <S%H5030><s%> out of their own hearts <S%H3820><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> ye the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; that prophesy out: Heb. that are prophets out of their own hearts

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto the foolish <S%H5036><s%> prophets <S%H5030><s%>, that follow <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> their own spirit <S%H7307><s%>, and have seen <S%H7200><s%> nothing! follow: Heb. walk after and: or, and things which they have not seen
O Israel <S%H3478><s%>, thy prophets <S%H5030><s%> are like the foxes <S%H7776><s%> in the deserts <S%H2723><s%>.

Ye have not gone up <S%H5927><s%> into the gaps <S%H6556><s%>, neither made up <S%H1443><s%> the hedge <S%H1447><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. gaps: or, breaches made: Heb. hedged the hedge

They have seen <S%H2372><s%> vanity <S%H7723><s%> and lying <S%H3577><s%> divination <S%H7081><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%>: and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath not sent <S%H7971><s%> them: and they have made others to hope <S%H3176><s%> that they would confirm <S%H6965><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%>.

Have ye not seen <S%H2372><s%> a vain <S%H7723><s%> vision <S%H4236><s%>, and have ye not spoken <S%H1696><s%> a lying <S%H3577><s%> divination <S%H4738><s%>, whereas ye say <S%H559><s%>, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> it; albeit I have not spoken <S%H559><s%>?

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Because ye have spoken <S%H1696><s%> vanity <S%H7723><s%>, and seen <S%H2372><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%>, therefore, behold, I am against you, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

And mine hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be upon the prophets <S%H5030><s%> that see <S%H2374><s%> vanity <S%H7723><s%>, and that divine <S%H7080><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%>: they shall not be in the assembly <S%H5475><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>, neither shall they be written <S%H3789><s%> in the writing <S%H3791><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, neither shall they enter <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>. assembly: or, secret, or, counsel

Because, even because they have seduced <S%H2937><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Peace <S%H7965><s%>; and there was no peace <S%H7965><s%>; and one built up <S%H1129><s%> a wall <S%H2434><s%>, and, lo <S%H2009><s%>, others daubed <S%H2902><s%> it with untempered <S%H8602><s%> morter: a wall: or, a slight wall

Say <S%H559><s%> unto them which daub <S%H2902><s%> it with untempered <S%H8602><s%> morter, that it shall fall <S%H5307><s%>: there shall be an overflowing <S%H7857><s%> shower <S%H1653><s%>; and ye <S%H859><s%>, O great hailstones <S%H417><s%> <S%H68><s%>, shall fall <S%H5307><s%>; and a stormy <S%H5591><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> shall rend <S%H1234><s%> it.
Lo, when the wall <S%H7023><s%> is fallen <S%H5307><s%>, shall it not be said <S%H559><s%> unto you, Where is the daubing <S%H2915><s%> wherewith ye have daubed <S%H2902><s%> it?

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; I will even rend <S%H1234><s%> it with a stormy <S%H5591><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> in my fury <S%H2534><s%>; and there shall be an overflowing <S%H7857><s%> shower <S%H1653><s%> in mine anger <S%H639><s%>, and great hailstones <S%H417><s%> <S%H68><s%> in my fury <S%H2534><s%> to consume <S%H3617><s%> it.

So will I break down <S%H2040><s%> the wall <S%H7023><s%> that ye have daubed <S%H2902><s%> with untempered <S%H8602><s%> morter, and bring <S%H5060><s%> it down to the ground <S%H776><s%>, so that the foundation <S%H3247><s%> thereof shall be discovered <S%H1540><s%>, and it shall fall <S%H5307><s%>, and ye shall be consumed <S%H3615><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof: and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Thus will I accomplish <S%H3615><s%> my wrath <S%H2534><s%> upon the wall <S%H7023><s%>, and upon them that have daubed <S%H2902><s%> it with untempered <S%H8602><s%> morter, and will say <S%H559><s%> unto you, The wall <S%H7023><s%> is no more, neither they that daubed <S%H2902><s%> it;

To wit, the prophets <S%H5030><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> which prophesy <S%H5012><s%> concerning Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and which see <S%H2374><s%> visions <S%H2377><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> for her, and there is no peace <S%H7965><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

Likewise, thou son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, set <S%H7760><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> against the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%>, which prophesy <S%H5012><s%> out of their own heart <S%H3820><s%>; and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> thou against them,

And say <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the women that sew <S%H8609><s%> pillows <S%H3704><s%> to all armholes <S%H679><s%> <S%H3027><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> kerchiefs <S%H4555><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of every stature <S%H6967><s%> to hunt <S%H6679><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%>! Will ye hunt <S%H6679><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>, and will ye save <S%H2421><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> alive <S%H2421><s%> that come unto you? armholes: or, elbows

And will ye pollute <S%H2490><s%> me among my people <S%H5971><s%> for handfuls <S%H8168><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%> and for pieces <S%H6595><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>, to slay <S%H4191><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> that should not die <S%H4191><s%>, and to save <S%H2421><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> alive <S%H2421><s%> that should not live <S%H2421><s%>, by your lying <S%H3576><s%> to my people <S%H5971><s%> that hear <S%H8085><s%> your lies <S%H3577><s%>?

Wherefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, I am against your pillows <S%H3704><s%>, wherewith ye <S%H859><s%> there hunt <S%H6679><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> to make them fly <S%H6524><s%>, and I will tear <S%H7167><s%> them from your arms <S%H2220><s%>, and will let the souls <S%H5315><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>, even the souls <S%H5315><s%> that ye hunt <S%H6679><s%> to make them fly <S%H6524><s%>. to make: or, into gardens

Your kerchiefs <S%H4555><s%> also will I tear <S%H7167><s%>, and deliver <S%H5337><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> out of your hand <S%H3027><s%>, and they shall be no more in your hand <S%H3027><s%> to be hunted <S%H4686><s%>; and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Because with lies <S%H8267><s%> ye have made the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> sad <S%H3512><s%>, whom I have not made sad <S%H3510><s%>; and strengthened <S%H2388><s%> the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked <S%H7451><s%>, that he should not return <S%H7725><s%> from his wicked <S%H7563><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, by promising him life <S%H2421><s%>: by: or, that I should save his life: Heb. by quickening him

Therefore ye shall see <S%H2372><s%> no more vanity <S%H7723><s%>, nor divine <S%H7080><s%> divinations <S%H7081><s%>: for I will deliver <S%H5337><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> out of your hand <S%H3027><s%>: and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
